name: Systemizing Quotient
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Reverse coded (Q#R) questions coded as strongly disagree = 2, slightly disagree = 1, else = 0. The other questions are coded as strongly agree = 2, slightly agree = 1, else = 0. Wakabayashi, A., Baron-Cohen, S., Wheelwright, S., Goldenfeld, N., Delaney, J., Fine, D., Smith, R., & Weil, L. (2006). Development of short forms of the Empathy Quotient (EQ-Short) and the Systemizing Quotient (SQ-Short). Personality and Individual Differences, 41(5), 929–940. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.paid.2006.03.017

variableMeasured.name: user_id
variableMeasured.description: Each participant's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: sex
variableMeasured.description: The participant's sex

variableMeasured.name: age
variableMeasured.description: The participant's age in years

variableMeasured.name: id
variableMeasured.description: Each questionnaire completion's unique ID

variableMeasured.name: starttime
variableMeasured.description: The time the questionnaire was started (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

variableMeasured.name: endtime
variableMeasured.description: The time the questionnaire was completed (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss)

variableMeasured.name: Q01
variableMeasured.description: If I were buying a car, I would want to obtain specific information about its engine.

variableMeasured.name: Q02
variableMeasured.description: If there was a problem with the electrical wiring in my home, I’d be able to fix it myself.

variableMeasured.name: Q03R
variableMeasured.description: I rarely read articles or web pages about new technology.

variableMeasured.name: Q04R
variableMeasured.description: I do not enjoy games that involve a high degree of strategy.

variableMeasured.name: Q05
variableMeasured.description: I am fascinated by how machines work.

variableMeasured.name: Q06
variableMeasured.description: In math, I am intrigued by the rules and patterns governing numbers.

variableMeasured.name: Q07R
variableMeasured.description: I find it difficult to understand instruction manuals for putting appliances together.

variableMeasured.name: Q08
variableMeasured.description: If I were buying a computer, I would want to know exact details about its hard disc drive capacity and processor speed.

variableMeasured.name: Q09R
variableMeasured.description: I find it difficult to read and understand maps.

variableMeasured.name: Q10R
variableMeasured.description: When I look at a piece of furniture, I do not notice the details of how it was constructed.

variableMeasured.name: Q11R
variableMeasured.description: I find it difficult to learn my way around a new city.

variableMeasured.name: Q12R
variableMeasured.description: I do not tend to watch science documentaries on television or read articles about science and nature.

variableMeasured.name: Q13
variableMeasured.description: If I were buying a stereo, I would want to know about its precise technical features.

variableMeasured.name: Q14
variableMeasured.description: I find it easy to grasp exactly how odds work in betting.

variableMeasured.name: Q15R
variableMeasured.description: I am not very meticulous when I carry out D.I.Y.

variableMeasured.name: Q16
variableMeasured.description: When I look at a building, I am curious about the precise way it was constructed.

variableMeasured.name: Q17R
variableMeasured.description: I find it difficult to understand information the bank sends me on different investment and saving systems.

variableMeasured.name: Q18
variableMeasured.description: When travelling by train, I often wonder exactly how the rail networks are coordinated.

variableMeasured.name: Q19R
variableMeasured.description: If I were buying a camera, I would not look carefully into the quality of the lens.

variableMeasured.name: Q20R
variableMeasured.description: When I hear the weather forecast, I am not very interested in the meteorological patterns.

variableMeasured.name: Q21
variableMeasured.description: When I look a mountain, I think about how precisely it was formed.

variableMeasured.name: Q22
variableMeasured.description: I can easily visualize how the motorways in my region link up.

variableMeasured.name: Q23R
variableMeasured.description: When I'm in a plane, I do not think about the aerodynamics.

variableMeasured.name: Q24
variableMeasured.description: I am interested in knowing the path a river takes from its source to the sea.

variableMeasured.name: Q25R
variableMeasured.description: I am not interested in understanding how wireless communication works.
